metadata.description: From the demented world of Dr. Grordbort comes this bumper-sized slice of steampunk derring-do! Collecting the first three installments in Greg Broadmore's retro sci-fi series, plus lavish new content, bonus features and a never-before-seen full-colour comic strip, expect oodles of space-faring action, spit-take humor and more rayguns than an extra-terrestrial NRA meet!
metadata.name: Dr. Grordbort Presents: Onslaught
